title: Zeit Presitrential Nominee 8/11: Kamala Harris, Bindi Irwin, Nickelback, Blockbuster, Neck Gaiter
itunes:title: Zeit Presitrential Nominee 8/11: Kamala Harris, Bindi Irwin, Nickelback, Blockbuster, Neck Gaiter
description:
On this edition of Zeit Presitrential Nominee Jack and Miles discuss Joe Biden announcing Kamala Harris as his running mate, Bindi Irwin is pregnant, Nickelback is doing something on the 14th, the final Blockbuster is turning into a temporary AirBnB, and Neck Gaiters are technically worse than no mask at all.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
